attributes.action: make it illegal for any party to stand for election if it has a policy of discriminating against any section of society
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition was inspired by the fact that two members of a party known to be overtly and virulently racist won seats in the  recent European elections.  Since they have an avowed policy of racism how can they claim to represent their Minority Ethnic constituents?  Their election means that people in that category have effectively been disenfranchised. 

This petition is not intended to imply that the only issue with which I am concerned is racism.   I am equally concerned with sexism, homophobia, ageism and, in fact, all forms of discrimination.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
